ComicInfo.Title: Always Darkest before the Dawn
ComicInfo.Summary: Always Darkest before the Dawn: Broadway, Brooklyn and Lexington head into the city to check out the club scene and get involved in a scuffle between Dracon's men and a stooge who is supposed to be selling guns for them. The stooge's girlfriend sees too much and is given to Xanatos' scientists who begin medical experiments on her. The trio of Gargoyles perch on top of a nearby building as the sun is rising but Lexington ends up being sold as a statue to Dracon himself. Unfortunately, one of Dracon's men recognizes him as one of the Gargoyles who interfered in their operations and Dracon prepares to destroy him.
